positions.subtitle: Kuehne+Nagel
positions.title: Assistant Manager | Solution and Implementation- Road Logistics

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: • Architecture designing for a centralized log analysis system for 3000+ servers generating 1TB+ log data per day.• Improve error identification and reduce troubleshoot time by 50% applied EFK cluster to facilitate log monitoring• Achieved 93% accuracy in classifying log messages using TF IDF and K means clustering to detect anomalies anderror
experience.description_html: • Architecture designing for a centralized log analysis system for 3000+ servers generating 1TB+ log data per day.• Improve error identification and reduce troubleshoot time by 50% applied EFK cluster to facilitate log monitoring• Achieved 93% accuracy in classifying log messages using TF IDF and K means clustering to detect anomalies anderror <!---->

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: • Created 8 metrics for measuring success & applied SQL to perform funnel analysis, fulfill data demand & find missing values.• Analyzed issues at 2 stages of user journey interacting with other teams & prepared product requirement document (PRD).• Used both qualitative and quantitative analysis techniques frequently and contributed in increasing customers by 23%.
experience.description_html: • Created 8 metrics for measuring success & applied SQL to perform funnel analysis, fulfill data demand & find missing values.• Analyzed issues at 2 stages of user journey interacting with other teams & prepared product requirement document (PRD).• Used both qualitative and quantitative analysis techniques frequently and contributed in increasing customers by 23%. <!---->

experience.title: Kshitij Campus Affiliate
experience.description: • Assisted the members in the Guest Reception team and successfully accommodated all the guests of Kshitij-2019(Techno-Management fest)• Publicized the fest in the colleges of West Bengal and Bihar and succeeded in achieving the highest ever participation from that region.• Worked in a team of 35 member team for the publicity and ground-level execution of 33 events in the technical symposium.
